html:
12.18.18  9:33 pm   Loved just did a bad thing! Is it a meta track about releasing song without video?

     no but i guess it is now

      Do you consider changing the rules or how you play the game doing something bad?

     i didn't change the rules. i failed at them

12.18.18  9:05 pm   so you released your song on tuesday, rather than friday as you initially planned. (I don't mind, I understand the importance of the tuesday release)

My question: did you use the extra time to finish up the song,

     there was no extra time but yes

      or to get ahead in the next video?

     still working on the same one

      Are you hoping to get back on schedule?

     yes

      If so, are you aiming for an even crazier schedule?

     yes

12.18.18  8:54 pm   i'm asking this question at 8:53 pm on tuesday, which you can see already but it's important to mention for context, if you don't finish the "bad thing" video by late-night tuesday, and you end up having to finish it a different day, will you finish it and release it on wednesday, or wait to release the video until the next tuesday?

     perhaps i will try to finish it every day, to give myself a new feeling of failure each day

12.18.18  8:52 pm   12.17.18  1:26 pm but there's some sort of new larger scale project you'll be gradually chipping away at alongside the songs and other stuff, right?

     sort of

      or did you abandon that?

     i'm not entirely sure what it is yet, but the central goal of it is something that hundreds of people have surely aspired to do in their lifetimes and failed, and only very few people can ever achieve

12.18.18  8:29 pm   what do you think about the grammys?

     they should let the judges win for a change

12.18.18  7:24 pm   How do I fix my sleep schedule? 

     i have no idea, but i know how to make it worse

12.18.18  7:16 pm   what do you have to say about the impending threat of nuclear annihilation?

     i say skip it

12.18.18  6:44 pm   How many feet are in a foot

     let me perform some calculations

12.18.18  5:50 pm   Hey Bill, can you make a song?

     sure

12.18.18  4:00 pm   It seems like some of your international viewers can't see your newest song on YouTube? The Art Track is not avaliable for them.

     it should be available to anyone after 12am dec 18, 2018, in their local time zone. except for a select few countries in which joy and pleasure is prohibited by the law

12.18.18  3:53 pm   How good is balance

     pretty good

12.18.18  3:44 pm   how to succeed post-singularity?  

     not necessary

12.18.18  3:32 pm   how did you get into music? was it school? or just ur brain was like "oh hey dude ur gūd @ music go do it."?

     it got into me

12.18.18  3:18 pm   any tips on how i can improve this song?... i'm kind of a noob @ music

     which song

12.18.18  3:12 pm   How Long did it approximately (in real time) take to make the "​history of the entire world, i guess"? (Music, Video, etc)

     11 months

12.18.18  2:35 pm   Is humor real or is it just a different type of social transgression?

     humor is the origins of this universe

12.18.18  2:25 pm   i'm in my english class and i have to write an analysis piece. what should i analyze? 

     the class

12.18.18  2:05 pm   Whats a question youve been wanting to find an answer too?

     how do magnets work

12.18.18  12:50 pm   is the "game" mentioned in "just did a bad thing" a metaphor for life?

     it might be

12.18.18  12:17 pm   So i had this thought the other day and im not sure why.  Any help would be appreciated.

     which thought was it

12.18.18  11:45 am   how am i ever going to be happy

     the answer may surprise you

12.18.18  11:44 am   how do you feel when all of a sudden you have a thought, and thinking about the thought you think, thinking about this thought is a nice thought, i think.

     in that case there is usually not much room for feelings

12.18.18  11:42 am   is the C or S silent i n Scent?

     neither

12.18.18  10:49 am   Why no fade out 

     on what

12.18.18  8:31 am   Bill help me name this chord F# A C D#

     F#diminished7. or if A is in the bass then it's Adiminished7. etc

12.18.18  6:47 am   What sort of question do you want to answer?

     it feels most meaningful when i am answering the question you want to ask

12.18.18  6:20 am   hey bill i'm having surgery tomorrow and i'm pretty nervous. can you help?

     maybe you could do surgery on them first .....

12.18.18  5:57 am   What should I do when my brain says I should do a thing but my body says I'm too lazy to do the thing ?

     take each other to court!

12.18.18  3:29 am   Do you believe in the existence of everything, even the inconceivable?

     i exist in the belief of everything

12.18.18  2:24 am   Best way to start the day?

     wake up

12.17.18  11:55 pm   Hey buddy. How's life treating you these days?

     pretty good

12.17.18  10:57 pm   if it's so important for you to have the exact date your content was created/finished on your website, rather than the date it was published, why do your song dates still show the same day as the videos? Clearly you have to finish them one or two days early for them to come out the same day as the videos. For example "just did a bad thing" came out today, 12/17 but you will probably list it as 12/18 in the song page. What gives?

     plot twist i fucked everything up worse than before. i will answer your other question later

12.17.18  10:54 pm   Will humans be around in a billion years?

     perhaps more or less

12.17.18  10:38 pm   is it better to hold all knowledge or to not know a couple things?

     new knowledge is always created but it is nice to have a hand or 2 in the game

12.17.18  10:24 pm   12.14.18  9:43 pm You say nothing is funny. What is everything, then?

     interesting

      And why do people laugh?

     due to science

12.17.18  10:01 pm   How do I live ? 

     so far you are doing a great job

12.17.18  8:23 pm   Are you now in a metaphorical fake jail because of missing the 2 week schedule deadline?

     no, but i seem to be in some kind of rehab which i unfortunately just went back to even though i thought i just got out

12.17.18  7:40 pm   how do you visualize your songs? do you see them in your head the way you see their cooresponding video? 

     usually i just hear them

12.17.18  7:35 pm   help i just ate all of my soup and forgot about the bread what do i do

     donate the bread to someone else, along with the wisdom you have accrued

12.17.18  6:47 pm   What is your opinion about cats?

     cats should be able to transcend opinion

12.17.18  6:35 pm   why am i screaming 

     could be fun

12.17.18  5:33 pm   why do you think that you're not good enough?

     hopefully i can be good and bad enough for everyone

12.17.18  4:09 pm   what is earth

     some kind of floatation device

12.17.18  3:30 pm   What is the thing you are working on?

     i don't know anymore

12.17.18  2:27 pm   If you could remove one, would you remove Halloween or April Fool's?

     that could cause a disruption in the space time continuum, the consequences of which could be disasterous

12.17.18  1:31 pm   what's a good way of saying something 

     yelling it

12.17.18  1:31 pm   life is crazy 

     that's true

12.17.18  1:30 pm   will you ever make us pay to watch your videos?

     probably not

12.17.18  1:26 pm   So, you're making a new history video.

     that's not true

      what phase of production are you in?

     songs

12.17.18  1:07 pm   am i cool?

     yes
